text: Beverly Archer (born July 19, 1948) is an American actress. She acts mostly on television. She played Iola in Mama's Family. She also appeared on a lot of other television shows. Archer retired from acting in 2000. She was born in Oak Park, Illinois. ==References== Category:Actors from Oak Park, Illinois Category:American television actors Category:1948 births Category:Living people
title: Beverly Archer
